website_summaries.verdict: A sleek design that is backed by the manufacturer. This is the best set of running boards on the market.
pros: Provides a precise fit for an affordable price
cons: The bolt holes don't line up perfectly, making installation a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, well made!!! No Regrets!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars/steps look and work awesome!! My wife can safely get in and out of Jeep now. They don’t stick out a lot, just the right amount. They weigh about 50 lbs. each, very strong and very well made. I like how they mount to vehicle, there are a total of nine screws each side, three underneath, and six to drip rail with nuts. They are textured black and look very sharp. I’m sure if I was to have a side impact these bars would help out. They look AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it more stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: If you think isn't looks good in the photo, wait till you see it physically... This product is absolutely beautiful. Easy install too, took me 2 hours to get both rails on without assistance. In regard to the people who have issues with holes lining up: I had one one hole on each rail that SEEMED to not line up. I was able to get it to line up by adding pressure to the rail with a jack. I just used a chunk of 2X4 to keep from scratching the rail. I didn't have to drill or bore out anything.
customer_reviews.author: James Vivelo

customer_reviews.title: very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and the first shipment one of the bars was bent in the package. contacted amazon and the shipped out a new right away and they paid for the return. happy with the customer service. these are heavy duty and are very strong. the step is narrow but it on my girlfriends jeep and she is OK with it. they look good and should hold up for years. the powder coating is good. We are happy with this purchase. it is defiantly easier with two people to install after you get it lined up and the first set of nuts in it gets easy.
customer_reviews.author: clarence schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, as always
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and product is amazing. I own a Tyger rear bumper protector and I knew that my side rails would be the same type of top-notch quality. The protections around the rails in the box were great. My only complaint was that aligning the holes on one side was ridiculously hard and the passenger side was super easy. The alignment was a bit off so it was a long battle. They are heavy! If you have another person working with you, it would be an easy install. If you go it alone like me, have something to prop up the rails.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: I like these rock sliders!
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy and heavy duty. Look great on the Jeep and are far better than the factory steps at offering protection. Not sure about some of the reviews mentioning alignment issues of bolt holes. Both sides bolted on my 2013 Sahara Unlimited without any problem. Just like anything with multiple alignments, put all the bolts in first leaving them loose, then tighten down once all are in. These things are heavy. Make sure you have a spare set of hands or some way to lift them. I installed them alone using a motorcycle lift to hold them in place while I got the bolts started.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Packaged very well and they were secure and protected inside the box with all hardware and instructions. Fit perfectly on my 2015 JKU. They are very sturdy and look great. I installed them myself in under a hour. I used jack stands to hold them until I got them lined up and a couple of the bolts in the rocker panels. No fitment issues at all, everything lined up perfectly. Gave my Jeep a great look and have no doubt they will give some much needed protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepguy17

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early and we're packed very well. They were wrapped in bubble wrap and boxed with foam as well. No scratches at all. Now installing is something you might want to have 2 people for. I used jack stands and it was rough. But once they were on, all of the holes lined up perfectly. I'm a 280 lb man and they hold me with no problems whatsoever. Definitely 5 stars. Would recommend more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Benton

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but had issues with the screws!
customer_reviews.text: 2015 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport JK. The packaging was sealed and had no damage. The product has no damage. It came with all necessary equipment/tools. Installation was pretty easy, but definitely need two people due to the weight. The only problem I’m facing with currently are with the inside screws. On both the steps, I could only get 1 (the middle to be specific) out of 3 screws to catch and stay in place. The screws fit, just wouldn’t catch. I’m trying to figuring out the problem or what to do, because I feel like I need all 3 screws to be in place for safety. Still trying to figure this one out. Overall, it looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Nib

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove, a very tight glove. Came very well packaged and protected. I did not have the fitment issues many had but i also had all hardware installed loosely before torquing everything down. I also did this by myself with a floor jack as an assistant, not as pretty as my wife but stronger and listens better. Started by aligning driver side as best as I could with the step sitting on the jack. Loosely fit majority of hardware but actually ended up jacking up the step to get a couple of bolts in. Once all were in place I torqued them down while the jack was still holding the step in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy open box. No warranty or support for missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Tyger final responded. All open box, damaged box of these are considered used and not warranted. No hardware is on you. Amazon should be fined, no mention of missing hardware. Someone raided the box and cut out hardware. Amazon? Aside for that they bolted up all holes aligned. Had to add 1/4" thick square strut washer to rear tab on both sides. Went to Bolt Depot.com for hardware. Tyger supplies (when box is not opened) Class 8.8. I went with Class 10.9 a stronger Zinc bolt and 18-8 SS fender washers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Heim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: 1st - these things look fantastic! 2nd - we have a 2018 JKU, and the bolt on could not have been easier. Seriously, these were delivered at 7:45 pm, and I had them unboxed, prepped, instructions read, installed, and was back in the house by 9pm! So in the dark, while teaching my son (and therefore going slow) it took less than an hour. That is simple. 3rd - I could not be more satisfied. They are durable, you can jack your vehicle up off them! Can't wait to hit the trails again, and put these things to the test off-road. Will update once that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Brimm

customer_reviews.title: STURDY, These slider are worth every dime
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the OEM rock sliders on my 2015 Jeep JKU Rubicon. I wanted something to put some distance between rocks and the body panels. These performed perfectly on the Rubicon Trail and Fordyce Trail. I see all the other pics of new installs but no pictures of these sliders being put through their paces. Yes, they're beat up but the doors don't have a ding on them. There isn't a tougher off road trail in the country than the Rubicon and so far so good and for the price I can afford to replace them several times if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Woodard

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Delivered yesterday afternoon, installed this morning in about an hour by myself ... watch the youtube install videos and it will be a heck of a lot easier ... use jack stands for support ... install center bolts/nuts loosely FIRST, then remove stands to complete the install VERY beefy tubes, definitely HEAVY DUTY My only complaint is the PACKAGING, it's HORRIBLE. Logistics carriers do not care how many caution labels you put on the box, it WILL arrive damaged. PLEASE FIND A BETTER WAY TO PACKAGE THESE
customer_reviews.author: James B Gatsby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Super sturdy and looks great. I purchased this set after seeing them online and then seeing a Jeep with them installed just a few hours later. The owner of that Jeep said he had them for three years and they still look new He also told me they had sustained a side impact with barely a scratch. I was sold at that point. These replaced a cheaper set of tubular sidebars on my Jeep that were rusting from the inside out. I wish I had bought these in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: David Carter

customer_reviews.title: The ladies in my life love these. My wife complained about not having them ...
customer_reviews.text: The ladies in my life love these. My wife complained about not having them and now that I have them she doesn't want to step on them because she doesn't want to "mess them up" because they look so nice. I recommend two people but I did it alone by sitting on the ground with my legs under the jeep and laying the step across my knees. I simply bent my knees, lifting the step to the jeep and put in a couple bolts to hold the step so I could get under the jeep and mount it. Then I went back and tightened the outside bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay johnson

customer_reviews.title: Installed pretty easily...
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the negative reviews I read, I rolled the dice and bought these running boards. They came without a scratch, wrapped quite well, and with all of the hardware. Instructions were easy to follow and I had both installed within an hour (despite me not paying attention and installing one on the outside of the pinch-weld rather than the inside. All holes lined up perfectly for my 2018 JK Unlimited. One thing that knocked them down to a 4-star rating was a lack of recommended torque settings for the hardware. But that’s it. They make the Jeep look much better and I’m glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: gkh

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and feel- 2015 Rubicon Unlimited
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the purchase of these side steps. They fit my 2015 Rubicon Unlimited. The bolt holes didn’t line up perfect, but a little brute force made it all work. Either use two people or jack stands to hold in place. Took me 2hrs to take off the old rocker panels and install these onto the Jeep. No welding, no missing parts. Very happy. All you’ll need is 10mm wrench, 10mm socket wrench with extension, 13mm socket.
customer_reviews.author: justin n

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and look tough!
customer_reviews.text: I love these steps! I put these on my 2017 Jeep JKU and went on perfectly. The fit and the finish are top notch and quality work on the welds. The steps are heavy and will be much easier installing with a buddy. I used a jacket and to hold one side while I worked on the other. They arrived packaged extremely well and the instruction are clear and easy to understand. All the hardware is supplied and quality bolts. I would definitely recommend these if you are looking for a quality step and not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: jtstang

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and sealed when arrived, although there’s small blemish - the wrapper should have noticed but may ignored the flaw upon packing. The installation was straight forward and fit my 2012 JEEP Wrangler perfectly. They are heavy duty, nicely powder coated in rough black finish and well made. Though, I wish the step would have been another inch or so wider.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and very strong. Definitely takes at least 2 people to install. A little more difficult for Jeeps 07-10 because there are no threaded holes in the bottom side of the Jeep. Just take your time and follow the instructions. Took about 60 to 90 minutes but that is because we had to figure it out and redo one side because of my own mistake. Well worth the time. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Not good for rock crawling on the Rubicon Trail
customer_reviews.text: These are really more like running boards. I love the look and sturdiness of them, but I am pretty sure I hit just about every rock on the Rubicon Trail. They just sit too low and below the frame, so no good clearance. They really took a beating the first trip. Sadly I will be taking them off and selling them, to go with another brand that tucks up better. :(
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: These are rugged looking sidebars with nice texture finished
customer_reviews.text: These are rugged looking sidebars with nice texture finished. The only problem I had with them was one of the tabs didn't line up. I had to drill another hole in the tab to make it work
customer_reviews.author: joe tanner

customer_reviews.title: Get the right tools for the job.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but the instructions were wrong. Found a video on the manufacturer’s website that said you need 10mm, 13mm and 16mm socket and wrenches. However even the 10mm is too large for the side screws. Also, you need an extended ratchet set, which the video doesn’t tell you. Eventually got them installed and they look great. Just wish the instructions were clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great step-rails for your Wrangler !!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I installed these side rails in about an hour. We did use my hydraulic jack to support these rails as they are heavy (indicating their structural strength ?? ). VERY SATISFIED with the results - looks great on her JEEP, and she has been asked (twice) where did she get them.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: but my shipping experience with UPS from Tyger was awesome. Not fitment problems
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about all the others ,but my shipping experience with UPS from Tyger was awesome . Not fitment problems. I installed these by myself with 2 jack stands in one hour. They are heavy but I like the protection verses the factory plastic. I would highly recommend as a long time Jeeper. These went on a 2013 wrangler unlimited Sahara with no problems. Sorry you others had issues . I think it's the installers experience and not the product. Instructions are minimal but easy enough to understand. I love these
customer_reviews.author: Terry M. Witte

customer_reviews.title: however I read several reviews from people with the same year saying that they will fit so I took the chance and so HAPPY we did
customer_reviews.text: We own a 2015 jeep wrangler sport unlimited... according to amazon these were not made to fit our jeep, however I read several reviews from people with the same year saying that they will fit so I took the chance and so HAPPY we did. They will fit but you have to love them and wiggle them into place, but it's possible.... they are very well made, heavy, and durable..... yes the box will arrive damaged (the rails are heavy) but we had zero problem with the box being so bad our suffering was falling out.... all of the bolts were included and nothing was missing. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Family

customer_reviews.title: The installation was very easy and the finish on the rails is really good
customer_reviews.text: The installation was very easy and the finish on the rails is really good. Now I don't have to listen to my wife complain about how hard it is to get into the Jeep, which is worth the money right there. We love them and they look great. Good quality, heavy duty and well built. I like them better than some other bigger, overpriced names in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Slanie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: We had no issues putting these on our 2011 Rubicon. Just make sure you read the directions and you are placing them on the correct side of the pinch weld. We didn't follow them closely, and put the first one on the wrong side and we had the same spacing issues as some of the other reviews. After we read the directions again and got it in the right spot, both fit like a glove. It's an easy mistake to make, but also easily correctable. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: These bars are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are awesome!!! They are heavy duty, sturdy, and well made. It took about 1 1/2 hours to put on from start to finish. The only thing I would like to see made differently... would be to have black powder coated plates instead of having washers to hide the previous outside marks made from original bars. Something should cover previous section that was covered from original bars...otherwise the star set this off nicely!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K

customer_reviews.title: Install on a 2017 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport. Product ...
customer_reviews.text: Install on a 2017 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport. Product came with no problems and very well packed for shipping. All of the parts needed were in the box. I didn't have any problems getting the bars to fit onto the Jeep. I'd say it went well even Update: The armor has been on the Jeep for 2 months now, a joint weld has a flaw and it is rusting badly. Calling supplier tomorrow to see what they will do about the product. Will continue to post updates.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My mechanic said these were easy to install and I did provide him some of the comments on this site to ensure he didn't run into any issues. They look fantastic and seem to be quite durable. Appears to be a good value as well!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought these, I looked at many siderails. I read all the reviews too. I saw the reviews talking about poor fit, won't fit, holes not lining up, etc. I also saw lots of reviews of people saying they fit fine. I just got mine, the holes do not line up. I can get the 6 bolts to fit on the side, but the 3 bolts that go into the threaded holes underneath won't catch. It looks like the bracket was welded in the wrong spot, about 1/4" off, and the metal is too thick to bend. Apparently they have very poor quality control on these. I'm returning mine, if you're a gambler, go ahead and order them.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: First. It fit my 2017 4dr jk perfectly. Second. Tyger did an excellent job packaging my steps because UPS did a horrible job handling my package. They arrived in shambles but the package inside was unharmed. These step installed in under an hour with the aid of a pair of jack stands and my cordless impact. Thats it! No mods needed. They look awesome and are sturdy as hell. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt James C

customer_reviews.title: Brackets don't line up
customer_reviews.text: Product is good quality (extremely heavy) however the brackets don't line up. This must be a chronic issue because the instructions say to use a jack to fix misalignment. I couldn't get it to work on my 2017 JKUR, I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, tough, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy and easy install. Heavier than I thought they would be. Was able to install by myself without help in my driveway. After I did passenger side install, on to my 2016 JK unlimited, in 45 minutes the drivers side went a little faster. Built very solid, I believe they would allow my jeep to "slide off rocks" if I encountered the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Inlow

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to install. Only complaint is there was abou a 2 inch long 1/16th deep cut/gouge on one but the box was not damaged nor was the plastic wrapper. Well packaged and built other than that gouge.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob JB

customer_reviews.title: Super easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I do like these side steps. Super easy to install, did it quickly, NO DRILLING NEEDED (which was awesome), and they’re a thick metal and I feel like these will last a long time. I also like that they’ve saved my doors from getting hit a few times by careless people in parkinglots. If I could change them I’d make them hang just a little lower. Because they’re so high it’s still a little hard to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Great boards for the price
customer_reviews.text: these boards look great and give me some piece of mind with protecting the side of my jeep. The passenger side installed perfectly but the rear driver side mount didn’t reach far back enough to reach the hole for the bolt. Had to drill out the hole on the board’s bracket to make it slightly bigger so that I could get the bolt threaded. A little worried about getting rust there now, but otherwise everything else is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my 2014 Jeep Rubicon. Solid and very well made. It took me about 2 hours to remove the factory rock sliders and install these. I think having a second pair of hands works fast and much safer. I did try the one person method with my jack stands, but gave up quickly when my son walked in the garage to see if I needed help. They're solid, they look good and my wife loves them. That's all I need to know.
customer_reviews.author: M. Belford

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: While instructions were not particularly helpful for a 2017, a review of the situation and common sense made them easy to install. Perfect machining, everything was spot on. Nerf bars were very protected in package. They are heavy and two people would be great for installation, although with some props, one person could do it. Could not be happier with the look, ease of installation, and superb packaging. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but not quite side steps
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing. Kind of dont come out far enough to be considered side steps but they are okay. Very sturdy and great quality. Add this to the list of things Jeep rides buy gor thiere jeep but never really intend on using but they look good!
customer_reviews.author: Donayja

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged, Easy to Install and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Item received quickly, well packaged and was a breeze to install. I installed these on a brand new 2018 JKU Sport (NOT JL) and everything went on super quick. Looks great, feels sturdy and will be taking my Jeep out on the field this weekend to see how it handles out on the dirt and rocks
customer_reviews.author: Byron D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Look good. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Look good. Very sturdy. Kids love them as steps. If the jku was used for hard core off roading I would get other sliders that come up instead of extend down as these decrease clearance slightly. The trade off for less clearance is a more functional step. Item just as pictured. Installed both sides in under 45 min total by myself. Have recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: RN^2

customer_reviews.title: Minor adjustments needed to mount, but great product.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't be a jeep owner ordering parts if I didn't expect some sort of adjustment and modification. these were easy to bold right on using a floor jack to hold them in position. The driver side did require a little persuasion. the middle and rear tab for mounting did not line up. After closer inspection, either the welder mounted it slightly off or the tabs got bent during shipping. Simply took the 15" adjustable wrench out and persuaded it to the front about 1/4". Of course, this meant three trial and error attempts at mounting and an additional 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Maple K Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! Took a couple hours with the help of ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Took a couple hours with the help of some extra hands. The passenger side fit perfectly on my 16 jku but the rear driver side bolt did not align. We tried every way to align the bolt but with no luck, I just left it alone. I bought a file to hopefully spend one weekend to file it down a bit to make it fit. Until then, it still feels strong, stable, and looks real good!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2018 Jeep JK
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit 2018 Jeep JK. The bolts along the pinch weld line up, however the brackets that attach to the underside of the frame are not long enough. The slots needs to be about a 1/4" longer. I now have to schedule an appointment with a mechanic to help modify the connection tabs to get these nerf bars attached. Just an unnecessary extra cost that I will now have to incur. Overall, the product itself meets my expectations, just not the ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: holmes0105

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 5 stars because these are some heavy duty high quality steps. Installation was easy. You could do it alone with jack stands but I had help to make it go faster. Zero issues with the install. My gripe has nothing to do with the step itself, I’m just not used to using a step to get in my Wrangler...so I’ll likely step over it to get in as usual. Will definitely come in handy when removing the top and for the shorties in my life. My sister already loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 for looks & function
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They were pretty easy to install and we did not use a jack. Powder coat looks very even and well covered. Overall very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Emilie W

customer_reviews.title: extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace some cheap hollow bars that rusted from the inside out. These look awesome, expect them to last longer with the coating on them.
customer_reviews.author: David J. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rock Rails and Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it and it was quite easy (once I figured out where the tabs were supposed to go). Install instructions were a little confusing, but I figured it out. Look up the youtube video on how to install and it will be much easier. They look great and are very sturdy! I can't wait to get them out on the trails and see how they perform on the rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and well built. Install was a little difficult because the frame bolt holes didn't quite line up. Nothing a hammer couldn't fix lol
customer_reviews.author: Randy R.

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions...
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you place the brackets behind the lip and it all goes in perfectly. So far I really like them. Only took about 20 minutes to install. Packaging came beat to hell but they wrapped the steps in bubble wrap and foam paper...I guess I'm just saying don't freak out if the box is a little banged up.
customer_reviews.author: TVB

customer_reviews.title: So far...  I really like them.  Very Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: They have been on a total of 30 minutes.... I was surprised by the weight... they are very sturdy and the finish seems to be good too. I replaced my Rubicon OEM sliders with these. My girls did not like not having steps (like my 2010 jku did). I wanted something more rugged than the OEM steps, but did not want to break the bank. A 2nd set of hands would have been great, but I was able to do by myself... I just used my floor jack... Honestly, I bought more by price... then quality/reviews. I think these fit in both categories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, tested in the field
customer_reviews.text: these arrived on time with sound packaging. they are beefy and strong - installed relatively easily - all parts included although a couple side screws (stabilizing, not load supporting really) were a little short because the sheet metal below my doors had bent a little. easily replaced. I took these out a couple days after install on a 6-8 rated traildamage trail and bounced my unlimited off the driver side rail a couple times and was immensely thankful I had them. No flex, no mark, no problem. protected the jeep and let me take on something I would not have attempted otherwise. Oh, and they look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great! And definitely protects against riding on logs!
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit narrow. I can only get my toes on it to climb in the Jeep! They look great tho! And are very sturdy! The backing plate is designed to be installed behind the soft weld on the bottom of the body!
customer_reviews.author: Tony A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these steps! They were easy to install with 2 people- they’re heavy so, definitely get a second person. We laid out a moving blanket, got under the Jeep and got everything bolted in. They are solid and look damn good- the finishing touch I needed.
customer_reviews.author: jc0921

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Took longer then expected for delivery, but when it arrived I can see why. They were well wrapped and protected, the box was a mess but they were just fine with all the bubble wrap around them. Went on my Jeep pretty easy, did it in an afternoon by myself with a couple of jacks to hold them up. Definitely recommend watching there little YouTube video first and copy the steps they go in and you should have no trouble getting them on.
customer_reviews.author: dnice1707

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product; came well packaged and on time. Very durable/ sturdy looking. I liked the fact that they had 3 mounts per side as opposed to 2 like many other options did. Installation was pretty straightforward; I used a jack and packaging boxes to hold them in place while mounting. Did have to finagle a few bolts to get them to fit but that's understandable. You can stand on these things and shake the whole Jeep. Love them- would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: 2017 wrangler unlimited sport s
customer_reviews.text: Great product and had absolutely no issues installing. Very solid and heavy. Directions are complete crap. For those with fitting issues make sure the steel tabs are bolted behind the body. Also, no need for the 10 mm bolts, extra large washers and the plates with a welded nut. Those are for the 2006-2010 models.
customer_reviews.author: FUR10USxGE0RGE

customer_reviews.title: I’m overall pleased with the way they look
customer_reviews.text: I’m overall pleased with the way they look. Nice and clean as well as solid! My first issue was the fitment.. like some others. Undercarriage mounts didn’t line up except one On either side. My second complaint is the missing hardware. Instructions call for “12 6mm lock washers” i recived 6. “6 - 8mm bolts” i rechved 5.. the list goes on. I understand “You get what you paid for” but i literally Didn’t get what i paid for.. my suggestions. Be more mindful of your measurements as well as the correct number of hardware. Nothing more frustrating then knowing that everything’s not where it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty!! We were worried about putting them on!! Watched video and it was so easy. Definitely recommend this product. Video showed 1 person which could be do able but with 2 it was easy peasy!!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Nuebel

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Initial review, as soon as I opened the box I loved these steps. The look and feel make me confident they are going to last a long time. Install was simple as long as you know how to turn a wrench. I will update later on how well they protect my Rubicon as soon as we get out on some rough trails.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and good looking! Every jeep Wrangler should have a set ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality product and good looking! Every jeep Wrangler should have a set of these bolted on for protection against impacts from the bottom plus they really finish off the overall outstanding design of the Wrangler. Terrific value for the money and very simple to install!
customer_reviews.author: Jack I. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic - bit of trouble with the fit.
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a 2016 JKU - as with several of the reviews, fit was an issue. One side went on fairly smooth, the drivers side not so much. Could not get the under carriage to line up. As far as looks, they look fantastic. Even better than I expected and they feel solid. Overall, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_458

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: From the time my son and I opened the box (packed very securely) to the time we finished, it took almost an hour. Everything lined up perfectly; it was nice to have some help, however, you could do it yourself. It is very well made and came with all the hardware needed. Best of all it looks great and is functional (helps shorter people get in).
customer_reviews.author: Hysershot

customer_reviews.title: Great side steps!! For the price, you "MUST" consider!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly perfect!!! Fits fine, no problem. Installation is seamless and directions are easy!! I love the way these side steps look!! Quality build and great look. I am above and beyond satisfied!!! If you are having trouble, you may not be following instructions
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, they are holding up well. Only issues is the bolts that hold them on rusted. Would recommend getting stainless rather than using what comes in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbarrossa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! These are heavy duty and so easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! These are heavy duty and so easy to mount. I have a 16 rubi and all holes lined up perfectly Did not have to drill one hole. Heavier than the stock rock sliders I took off, sit lower of course so you will lose some ground clearance compared to the stock rock sliders but they are no lower than any skid plate under the jeep. They look great! You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They work! Took the JKU to Uwharrie this weekend. Slid right off several rocks. Even if you don't plan to rock crawl in your Jeep, these are less expensive than some side steps and they perform double duty. May as well have them and not need them than need them and not have them.
customer_reviews.author: V Roze

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Replace my stock with these and they look great so happy with them. Heavy had to get my husband to help put them in place i could not hold myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have had them on my Jeep for over a year and still look great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: girlhunter

customer_reviews.title: "Freedom Edition Steps"
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the perfect match for my 2015 Freedom Edition JKU. Very heavy and well made. Bolts up to existing holes from factory rock rails. Would give 5 stars but had to "persuade" them to fit as top brackets did not line up perfectly with holes in chassis. Used a 3 lb hammer, pry bar and ultimately my impact Wrench to get in the last bolt. Well worth the trouble - they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a little bit of a pain but got them on with some help from my brother. We discovered that we had to use just about every screw size available to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Well made and look great
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and were well packaged. No damage on them at all. A lot of reviewers said that things didn't quite line up right, but we didn't have that issue. We installed these on a 2007 wrangler Sahara unlimited. They installed easily without an issues. They are heavy duty and seen to be very sturdy and well made. I will say that they don't give you as much of a foothold as the stock running boards do (they aren't as wide), but so far it hasn't been that noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: chillybreeze

customer_reviews.title: Getting Looks!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Looking Product! All the reviews were right on. INSTALL: Well, it pays to look VEWRY CAREFULLY at the picture. The first try to install, well didn't go so well. Then we saw in the install instructions that the vetrtical tab goes behind the Jeep rail and BAMM, perfect fit. Thank goodness, we looked at those directions a 5th time!
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Very nice upgrade for your Jeep JKU
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on our 2018 Jeep JKU. Extremely sturdy, almost no flex when using them. Haven’t really off-roaded with them but they seem like they’d hold up well. Really like the look of these steps.
customer_reviews.author: haley onwiler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2016 Jeep Wrangler Sahara. Very simple installation. Very decent sturdy product. And the stars on them are just an added bonus. Makes the Sahara look very beefy and sporty. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy R Gohn

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, two person installation
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a two person install. These are heavy and good quality. These should be used more of a under body protection than a step rail as they don’t stick out as much as the stock rail, but I have hit done large rocks and they have held up so I am happy 😆
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy mod
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Easy to install and very sturdy. I had Nerf bars previously and these blow then away.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my 2012 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited. They look great. I had them professionally installed. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: awesome finished product
customer_reviews.text: wasn't sure what I was gonna get,,box end was damaged,,but when opened found that they covered ends with protective covers,,,then found out who heavy duty they were,,,took 30min for myself to install,,awesome finished product,,was gonna go alum,,,glad I didn't!!
customer_reviews.author: tim phillips

customer_reviews.title: Overall best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Easy to install, just remember there's two set of the three bolts that go to the frame depending which one you have, because I was like WT...then realized I had the wrong bolt. I had to use my jack and jack stands by myself. Instructions are so so. There's videos on YouTube though that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! It took me less than two hours to install them without assistance. As others mentioned ensure that all bolts are in place before you tighten any of them down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Side Steps for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and easy to install. Look great and seem to be very sturdy built.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Forbes

customer_reviews.title: well made and high quality
customer_reviews.text: i was impressed with the rugged construction and ease of installation. i have had them on my jeep for almost a year now and no problems or rust at all even with driving in midwestern salty winters
customer_reviews.author: traci

customer_reviews.title: On time and as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These side bars were quite easy to install, even for this 65 year old. I used the floor jacks to hold them in place and all the holes and bolts aligned perfectly. using my air ratchet and socket set it took all of 90 minutes to take the old guards off and install the side bars. They look real sharp as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: One of the best upgrades for any Jeep owner
customer_reviews.text: One of the best upgrades I've done to my Jeep. You can't beat the price and quality. The Tyger side rails arrived on time and well packaged. Installation was simple and straight forward. Quality fit and construction, if you are thinking of upgrading from stock side steps, look no further​ this is a no brainer DYI job that adds protection and eye appeal to any Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: B Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install! Well Built and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The side rails were very well packaged for shipping. No scuffs anywhere on them on arrival. We removed the stock rock rails and put the Tyger Auto rails on in the dark. Very easy install. It took us 1.5hrs to install and a good 30-45 minutes of that was fumbling around for the right tools. The rails also came with replacement hardware, so we were able to throw away the old rusted ones. Overall we are very satisfied with the rails!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: The powder coat finish is excellent. They are well made and were easy to install. Make sure to watch the video on Youtube.
customer_reviews.author: William Bell

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove! Love the LOOK!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! Extremely strong and sturdy. Packaged well and no issues during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: D-Bud

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy duty item. I have not been wheeling in these yet but they seem like they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and looks awesome!! Easy to install..with the help of a floor jack
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!
customer_reviews.text: I freakin LoVE these!! They are heavyweight, quality built and BEAUTIFUl! I put it on my 2016 rubicon unlimited and the boys didn't have to drill any holes. Follow directions and installation is a breeze. Took only 20 mins to complete. They are 74" long and fit well with my 35s
customer_reviews.author: shelliejt

customer_reviews.title: For the price....
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product. Seem sturdy and beefy enough to handle some rocks. Holes lined up great as well for me. Only reason I knocked off stars was the driver side rail already had a couple chips in the coating, and it must have happened long before they got to me because they had already rusted the whole pieces of metal that would have been showing. Good buy for the price though, and they do look good on the jeep!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a step, but look great
customer_reviews.text: Look great! They don’t come out very far, so not really much of a step.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: They were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Received this within a few days. These steps are very well made and that means...HEAVY. Took about an hour to install. They were better than expected! Had to fight to get all the holes line up. But I am extremely pleased! The coating is thick and well applied. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong appearance
customer_reviews.text: Easy 2 person install, do not attempt to lift, hold in place, and install by yourself. Very sturdy and looks great. Gave 4 stars bc my passenger side arrived with a scratch in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: They went on very easy. Honestly you don’t even need the instructions, but that is included so no worries there. They seem to hold up quite well. Definitely will write another review after testing them out on the trails. A little skeptical on the paint finish but we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great after almost a year and they work awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - heavy box, easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an accessory to my 2015 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited. NOTE: The box is heavy - get a friend to help you install them. Once you can handle the box, installation is less than 1 hour tops and that includes me attempting to help my auto-inclined husband, which I was not as helpful as I thought. They look great on my jeep. Definitely glad I bought these rather than the factory kit.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Bricknell

product_meta.title: Tyger Auto TG-JA2J2239B Star Armor Kit for 2007-2018 Jeep Wrangler JK 4 Door (Exclude 2018 Wrangler JL Models) | Textured Black | Side Step | Nerf Bars | Running Boards
product_meta.description: TYGER AUTO focus on developing premium aftermarket auto parts that meet or exceed OE quality standards. All TYGER parts are covered with No-Hassle and will make your vehicle stand out on the road! Fitment: 2007-2018 Jeep Wrangler JK 4 Door (Excl. 2018 JL Models);
feature_bullets: Fits 2007-2018 Jeep Wrangler JK 4 Door (Exclude 2018 Wrangler JL Models). TYGER Dual girder system provides maximum wheel-to-wheel protection for underside and rocker panel area from damaging impacts. Keeps Jeep from catching on rocker panel and hanging up on obstacles.
Dual girder system provides maximum wheel-to-wheel protection for underside and rocker panel area from damaging impacts. Keeps Jeep from catching on rocker panel and hanging up on obstacles.
Heavy-duty 2inch diameter & 0.120inch wall thickness tubes. One-piece design. Dual stage powder coated textured black finish.
Easy Bolt-On installation. No drilling required. (DIY instruction included in the package.)
TYGER Limited Lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars730 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
